resources.string: Dhyanam_
#MINDTIME
#MEDITATION
#INNERPEACE
#VIBES
“Your goal is not to battle with the mind, but to witness the mind.” – Swami Muktananda
“Meditation is like a gym in which you develop the powerful mental muscles of calm and insight.”– Ajahn Brahm
“The more regularly and the more deeply you meditate, the sooner you will find yourself acting always from a center of peace.”– J. Donald Walters
“In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.”
SKIP
Lets Get Started
NOT Registered YET? REGISTER HERE
If you want to find God, hang out in the space between your thoughts.\n– Alan Cohen
Accepting the reality of change gives rise to equanimity.\n– Allan Lokos
Life is a mystery – mystery of beauty, bliss and divinity. Meditation is the art of unfolding that mystery.\n– Amit Ray
Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.\n– Buddha
What we are today comes from our thoughts of yesterday, and our present thoughts build our life of tomorrow. Our life is the creation of our mind.\n– Buddha
Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.\n– Dalai Lama
The thing about meditation is that you become more and more YOU.\n– David Lynch
Your goal is not to battle with the mind, but to witness the mind.\n– Swami Muktananda
“You’ve gotta dance like there’s nobody watching, love like you’ll never be hurt, sing like there’s nobody listening, and live like it’s heaven on earth.”\n ― William W. Purkey
“Never regret anything that made you smile.”\n – Mark Twain
“This is a reminder to you to create your own rule book, and live your life the way you want it.”\n – Reese Evans
“If you don’t get out of the box you’ve been raised in, you won’t understand how much bigger the world is.” – Angelina Jolie
“If you can dream it, you can do it.”\n – Walt Disney
“Today is your opportunity to build the tomorrow you want.”\n – Ken Poirot
The state we call realization is simply being oneself, not knowing anything or becoming anything.\n– Ramana Maharshi
Put your heart, mind, intellect, and soul even to your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.\n– Swami Sivananda
Quiet the mind, and the soul will speak.\n– Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati
Your mind is your instrument. Learn to be its master and not its slave.\n– Remez Sasson
Believe in yourself and the world will be at your feet.\n– Swami Vivekananda
A few conscious-hearted, sincere, and energetic men and women can do more in a year than a mob in a century.\n– Swami Vivekananda
